title: Error:Unable to access jarfile
author: ShenMi
txt_content:
当我打开MC登陆器时弹出对话框：
Error:Unable to access jarfile 后面是文件路径
    我该怎么办

replies.author: Qfang23
replies.txt_content: 你需要去www.java.com下载并安装一个java……

replies.author: ShenMi
replies.txt_content:
Qfang23 发表于 2014-3-29 15:20
你需要去www.java.com下载并安装一个java……

replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content:
